name: HoloCOGs 0.1
description:
Simple puzzle game for Hololens 2.

The task is easy, just make all the blue cog wheels spinning! But be aware of limited supplies!

The green wheel is the starting motor. Using a pinch gesture grab one of the three white wheels, put it on a free axis and connect the motor. The key is to spin all the blue wheels at once.

Once you grab a free wheel, the counter goes down. After the count is down to zero, you are left only with the active wheels.

Did you make some of the blue ones spinning? Good job, but you are not done yet :)
